channel.title: Pytorch on Thiago B. Procaci
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on Thiago B. Procaci

item.title: YouTube thumbnail classification using Pytorch
item.description: Overview This is a step-by-step of how to classify thumbnail images with deep learning models using PyTorch library. All references to Python code (classes, method) can be found at this GitHub repository. Problem Given two youtube channels, what thumbnail corresponds to each channel? It is a problem of image classification. We choose two YouTube channels to perform this classification: Nerdologia and Peixe Babel. Downloading Thumbnails We are going to use CNN (convolutional neural network) to solve the problem.
